name: CryENGINE Facial Expression Library
summary: Learn about .FXL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: FXL files store facial expressions for a character model (.CHR file). The FXL file to load for a given character is specified in the .CHRPARAMS file.

description: File created with the CryENGINE SDK, a program toolkit used for developing 3D games; saves a library of facial expressions for a 3D character; can include talking expressions or looks of concern, happiness, anger, and others.
